ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvmeq0.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvmeq0.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvmeq0.5 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- A = A |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_nvmeq0 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A M A ) = Z <-> A = A ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A M A ) = Z <-> A = A ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A M A ) = Z ) |
